sentences.en: Also, the number of his bodhisattva disciples is and incalculable.
sentences.cn: 菩萨弟子亦复如是, 其量无边不可称数.

sentences.en: At the submicroscopic level a gas appears to be an incalculable chaos of flying molecules.
sentences.cn: 从亚微观的观点来看,气体是一群不计其数的、无规则乱飞的分子.

sentences.en: Dorset, of late , had grown more than usually morose and incalculable.
sentences.cn: 最近多森变得越加乖僻,越加难以相处了.

sentences.en: Ford was acquitted, but the damage to the company was incalculable.
sentences.cn: 虽然宣判福特公司无罪, 但公司的损失是无法估量的.
他有一种捉摸不定的脾气.

sentences.en: He warned that the effects of any war would be incalculable.
sentences.cn: 他警告说任何战争造成的后果都是不可估量的。

sentences.en: Her contribution to our work is incalculable.
sentences.cn: 她对我们工作的贡献极大。

sentences.en: It was misery to think of Mr. Elliot's attentions. Their evil was incalculable.
sentences.cn: 一想起埃利奥特先生在大献殷勤,就令人痛苦. 他的这番殷勤真是后患无穷.

sentences.en: The loss caused by a nuclear war is incalculable.
sentences.cn: 核子战争所造成的损失是无法估量的.

sentences.en: The oil spill has caused incalculable damage to the environment.
sentences.cn: 这次石油泄漏对环境造成了难以估计的损害。

sentences.en: The sands of the beach are incalculable.
sentences.cn: 海滩上的沙是数不尽的.

sentences.en: The sands of the sea are incalculable in number.
Therefore , your opinion will be of incalculable value to us.
sentences.cn: 您的观点对于我们将有不可估量的价值.

sentences.en: This has done incalculable damage to his reputation.
sentences.cn: 这给他的声誉造成了难以估量的损失。

sentences.en: This necklace isn't worth anything in money terms, but its worth to me is incalculable.
sentences.cn: 这条项链用金钱衡量不值什么, 但对我来说它的价值是无法计算的.

sentences.en: What would happen now in the dim, incalculable hours?
sentences.cn: 现在在这幽暗的 、 难以预测的时辰里会发生什么事情 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 无数的；不可计算的；不可预料的

trans.tran_cn: 数不清的，不可估量的，极大的，不可预料的
